#### ç”¨æˆ·è¡¨ (users)
```sql
CREATE TABLE users (
    id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
```

#### æœç´¢è®°å½•è¡¨ (search_records)
```sql
CREATE TABLE search_records (
    id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id BIGINT,
    search_keyword VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    search_result TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);
```

#### å­¦ä¹ å†…å®¹è¡¨ (learning_contents)
```sql
CREATE TABLE learning_contents (
    id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    popularity_score INT DEFAULT 0,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
```

```diff
+ package com.zhimiao.service;
+ 
+ import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
+ import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
+ import org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient;
+ import org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClientResponseException;
+ import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
+ import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
+ import reactor.core.publisher.Mono;
+ 
+ @Service
+ public class GeminiService {
+ 
+     @Value("${gemini.api.key}")
+     private String apiKey;
+ 
+     @Value("${gemini.api.url}")
+     private String apiUrl;
+ 
+     private final WebClient webClient;
+     private final ObjectMapper objectMapper;
+ 
+     public GeminiService() {
+         this.webClient = WebClient.builder().build();
+         this.objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è°ƒç”¨Gemini APIç”Ÿæˆå†…å®¹
+      * @param prompt ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥çš„æç¤ºè¯
+      * @return APIå“åº”ç»“æœ
+      */
+     public String generateContent(String prompt) {
+         try {
+             // æ„å»ºè¯·æ±‚ä½“
+             String requestBody = buildRequestBody(prompt);
+             
+             // å‘é€è¯·æ±‚å¹¶è·å–å“åº”
+             String response = webClient.post()
+                     .uri(apiUrl + "?key=" + apiKey)
+                     .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
+                     .bodyValue(requestBody)
+                     .retrieve()
+                     .bodyToMono(String.class)
+                     .block();
+ 
+             // è§£æå“åº”
+             return parseResponse(response);
+             
+         } catch (WebClientResponseException e) {
+             return "APIè°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥: " + e.getMessage() + " (çŠ¶æ€ç : " + e.getStatusCode() + ")";
+         } catch (Exception e) {
+             return "å¤„ç†è¯·æ±‚æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: " + e.getMessage();
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ„å»ºGemini APIè¯·æ±‚ä½“
+      */
+     private String buildRequestBody(String prompt) {
+         try {
+             return "{\n" +
+                    "  \"contents\": [{\n" +
+                    "    \"parts\": [{\n" +
+                    "      \"text\": \"" + escapeJson(prompt) + "\"\n" +
+                    "    }]\n" +
+                    "  }]\n" +
+                    "}";
+         } catch (Exception e) {
+             throw new RuntimeException("æ„å»ºè¯·æ±‚ä½“å¤±è´¥", e);
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è§£æGemini APIå“åº”
+      */
+     private String parseResponse(String response) {
+         try {
+             JsonNode jsonNode = objectMapper.readTree(response);
+             JsonNode candidates = jsonNode.get("candidates");
+             
+             if (candidates != null && candidates.isArray() && candidates.size() > 0) {
+                 JsonNode firstCandidate = candidates.get(0);
+                 JsonNode content = firstCandidate.get("content");
+                 if (content != null) {
+                     JsonNode parts = content.get("parts");
+                     if (parts != null && parts.isArray() && parts.size() > 0) {
+                         JsonNode text = parts.get(0).get("text");
+                         if (text != null) {
+                             return text.asText();
+                         }
+                     }
+                 }
+             }
+             
+             return "APIå“åº”æ ¼å¼å¼‚å¸¸: " + response;
+             
+         } catch (Exception e) {
+             return "è§£æå“åº”å¤±è´¥: " + e.getMessage();
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è½¬ä¹‰JSONå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
+      */
+     private String escapeJson(String text) {
+         return text.replace("\\", "\\\\")
+                   .replace("\"", "\\\"")
+                   .replace("\n", "\\n")
+                   .replace("\r", "\\r")
+                   .replace("\t", "\\t");
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æµ‹è¯•APIè¿æ¥
+      */
+     public String testConnection() {
+         return generateContent("ä½ å¥½ï¼Œè¯·ç®€å•å›å¤ä¸€å¥è¯ç¡®è®¤è¿æ¥æ­£å¸¸ã€‚");
+     }
+ }
```

æŠ¥é”™æ˜¾ç¤ºAPIè°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥: 400 Bad Request from POST https://dashscope.aliyuncs.com/compatible-mode/v1/chat/completions (çŠ¶æ€ç : 400 BAD_REQUEST),,éƒ¨åˆ†å‚è€ƒä»¥ä¸‹é…ç½®å†…å®¹ -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import asyncio
import os
import inspect          # æ–°å¢ï¼Œç”¨äºåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ awaitable
from typing import Optional, Callable
from openai import AsyncOpenAI
from tenacity import retry, stop_after_attempt, wait_exponential

class QwenModelConfig:
    """
    å°è£… Qwenï¼ˆé˜¿é‡Œäº‘ DashScope OpenAI å…¼å®¹æ¥å£ï¼‰æ–‡æœ¬æ¨¡å‹ã€‚
    """

    def __init__(
        self,
        api_key: Optional[str] = None,
        model_name: str = "qwen3-235b-a22b",
        base_url: str = "https://dashscope.aliyuncs.com/compatible-mode/v1",
        system_prompt: str = "You are a helpful assistant."
    ):
        api_key = (
            api_key
            or os.getenv("QWEN_API_KEY")
            or os.getenv("DASHSCOPE_API_KEY")
        )
        if not api_key:
            raise ValueError(
                "æœªæ‰¾åˆ° DashScope APIâ€‘KEYï¼è¯·åœ¨å®ä¾‹åŒ–æ—¶ä¼ å…¥ api_key "
                "æˆ–è®¾ç½®ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ QWEN_API_KEY / DASHSCOPE_API_KEY"
            )

        self.async_client = AsyncOpenAI(
            api_key=api_key,
            base_url=base_url,
        )
        self.model_name = model_name
        self.system_prompt = system_prompt

    @retry(stop=stop_after_attempt(3),
           wait=wait_exponential(multiplier=1, min=2, max=10))
    async def process_input(
        self,
        prompt: str,
        model_name: Optional[str] = None,
        temperature: float = 0.7,
        max_tokens: int = 1024,
        stream: bool = True,
        on_stream: Optional[Callable[[str], None]] = None
    ) -> str:

        model = model_name or self.model_name
        messages = [
            {"role": "system", "content": self.system_prompt},
            {"role": "user", "content": prompt}
        ]

        if not stream:
            resp = await self.async_client.chat.completions.create(
                model=model,
                messages=messages,
                temperature=temperature,
                max_tokens=max_tokens,
                stream=False
            )
            return resp.choices[0].message.content

        collected_text = ""
        try:
            stream_resp = await self.async_client.chat.completions.create(
                model=model,
                messages=messages,
                temperature=temperature,
                max_tokens=max_tokens,
                stream=True
            )
        except Exception as e:
            print("å¯¹è¯åˆ›å»ºé”™è¯¯ï¼š"+str(e))
            return QwenResponse("å¯¹è¯åˆ›å»ºé”™è¯¯")
        try:
            async for chunk in stream_resp:
                if chunk.choices and chunk.choices[0].delta.content:
                    delta = chunk.choices[0].delta.content
                    collected_text += delta
                    if on_stream:
                        # ------------------------ ä¿®æ”¹å¼€å§‹ ------------------------
                        # åŒæ—¶å…¼å®¹åŒæ­¥å‡½æ•°ä¸ async åç¨‹å‡½æ•°
                        result = on_stream(delta)
                        if inspect.isawaitable(result):   # è‹¥è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯å¯ç­‰å¾…å¯¹è±¡
                            await result                   # åˆ™ç­‰å¾…å®ƒæ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•
                        # ------------------------ ä¿®æ”¹ç»“æŸ ------------------------
        except Exception as e:
            # å¤§æ¦‚ç‡æ˜¯æ•°æ®è¢«ç»¿ç½‘è¿‡æ»¤äº†ã€‚
            print("æ•°æ®è¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯", e)
            return QwenResponse("æ•°æ®è¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯ï¼š"+str(e))
        return QwenResponse(collected_text)
    
    
class QwenResponse:
    """æ¨¡æ‹ŸOpenAIå“åº”æ ¼å¼çš„åƒé—®å“åº”ç±»"""

    def __init__(self, response_data):
        """
        å¢åŠ textçš„å±æ€§

        å‚æ•°:
            response_data: APIè¿”å›çš„åŸå§‹å“åº”æ•°æ®
        """
        self.text = response_data



# ======================= è‡ªæµ‹å…¥å£ =======================
def main():
    from configs.config import qwen_api_key as api_key
    if not api_key:
        raise RuntimeError(
            "è¯·å…ˆè®¾ç½®ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ QWEN_API_KEYï¼ˆæˆ– DASHSCOPE_API_KEYï¼‰ï¼Œ"
            "æˆ–åœ¨ä»£ç ä¸­ç›´æ¥ä¼ é€’ api_keyã€‚"
        )

    qwen = QwenModelConfig(api_key=api_key)

    async def test():

        print("\n>>> æµå¼æ¨¡å¼ï¼ˆåŒæ­¥å›è°ƒï¼‰")
        def printer(delta):
            print(delta, end="", flush=True)

        txt_stream = await qwen.process_input(
            "å¦‚ä½•ç©¿è¶Šæˆå´‡ç¥¯?",
            stream=True,
            on_stream=printer
        )
        print("\n\n[æ¨¡å‹è¾“å‡º] \n", txt_stream.text)

    asyncio.run(test())


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

```diff
+             String result = qwenService.testConnection();
```

+ ### ğŸ”Œ 3.1 APIè°ƒç”¨æ¨¡å—
+ 
+ #### å…·ä½“æ­¥éª¤ï¼š
+ 1. åˆ›å»º `api.js` æ–‡ä»¶
+ 2. å°è£…HTTPè¯·æ±‚æ–¹æ³•
+ 3. å®ç°é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†
+ 4. æ·»åŠ åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†

+ #### ä»£ç å®ç°ï¼š
+ ```javascript
+ class WhysAPI {
+     constructor() {
+         this.baseURL = 'http://localhost:8080/api';
+         this.timeout = 10000; // 10ç§’è¶…æ—¶
+     }
+     
+     async request(endpoint, options = {}) {
+         const url = `${this.baseURL}${endpoint}`;
+         const config = {
+             method: 'GET',
+             headers: {
+                 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
+             },
+             ...options
+         };
+         
+         try {
+             const response = await fetch(url, config);
+             if (!response.ok) {
+                 throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`);
+             }
+             return await response.text();
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('APIè¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥:', error);
+             throw error;
+         }
+     }
+     
+     async askQuestion(question) {
+         return await this.request(`/ask?q=${encodeURIComponent(question)}`);
+     }
+     
+     async getTopics() {
+         return await this.request('/topics');
+     }
+     
+     async checkStatus() {
+         return await this.request('/status');
+     }
+ }
+ ```
+ 
+ #### æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼š
+ - [ ] æµ‹è¯•APIè¿æ¥çŠ¶æ€
+ - [ ] éªŒè¯é—®ç­”åŠŸèƒ½
+ - [ ] æµ‹è¯•é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†æœºåˆ¶
+ - [ ] æ£€æŸ¥è¶…æ—¶å¤„ç†

+ **æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç **ï¼š

+     const api = new WhysAPI();

+         // æµ‹è¯•çŠ¶æ€æ£€æŸ¥
+         const status = await api.checkStatus();
+         console.log('APIçŠ¶æ€:', status);

+         // æµ‹è¯•é—®ç­”åŠŸèƒ½
+         const answer = await api.askQuestion('ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½ï¼Ÿ');
+         console.log('AIå›ç­”:', answer);

+ #### æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½å®ç°ï¼š
+ ```javascript
+ class SearchManager {
+     constructor() {
+         this.api = new WhysAPI();
+         this.searchInput = document.getElementById('searchInput');
+         this.searchButton = document.getElementById('searchButton');
+         this.resultsContainer = document.getElementById('results');
+         
+         this.initEventListeners();
+     }
+     
+     initEventListeners() {
+         // æœç´¢æŒ‰é’®ç‚¹å‡»
+         this.searchButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
+             this.handleSearch();
+         });
+         
+         // å›è½¦é”®æœç´¢
+         this.searchInput.addEventListener('keypress', (e) => {
+             if (e.key === 'Enter') {
+                 this.handleSearch();
+             }
+         });
+         
+         // å®æ—¶è¾“å…¥æç¤ºï¼ˆé˜²æŠ–ï¼‰
+         this.searchInput.addEventListener('input', 
+             this.debounce(() => this.showSuggestions(), 300)
+         );
+     }
+     
+     async handleSearch() {
+         const question = this.searchInput.value.trim();
+         if (!question) return;
+         
+         this.showLoading();
+         
+         try {
+             const answer = await this.api.askQuestion(question);
+             this.displayAnswer(question, answer);
+         } catch (error) {
+             this.showError('æœç´¢å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•');
+         }
+     }
+     
+     showLoading() {
+         this.resultsContainer.innerHTML = `
+             <div class="loading">
+                 <div class="spinner"></div>
+                 <p>AIæ­£åœ¨æ€è€ƒä¸­...</p>
+             </div>
+         `;
+     }
+     
+     displayAnswer(question, answer) {
+         this.resultsContainer.innerHTML = `
+             <div class="qa-result">
+                 <div class="question">
+                     <strong>é—®ï¼š</strong>${question}
+                 </div>
+                 <div class="answer">
+                     <strong>ç­”ï¼š</strong>${answer}
+                 </div>
+             </div>
+         `;
+     }
+     
+     debounce(func, wait) {
+         let timeout;
+         return function executedFunction(...args) {
+             const later = () => {
+                 clearTimeout(timeout);
+                 func(...args);
+             };
+             clearTimeout(timeout);
+             timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
+         };
+     }
+ }
+ ```

#### **æ­¥éª¤3ï¼šåˆ›å»ºJavaScriptäº¤äº’åŠŸèƒ½**

è¯·å°†ä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹å¤åˆ¶åˆ° `frontend/js/main.js` æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼š

```javascript
// A World of Whys - ä¸»è¦JavaScriptåŠŸèƒ½

class WhysApp {
    constructor() {
        this.init();
    }

    init() {
        this.bindEvents();
        this.showWelcomeMessage();
    }

    bindEvents() {
        // æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½
        const searchInput = document.getElementById('mainSearchInput');
        const searchBtn = document.getElementById('mainSearchBtn');

        if (searchBtn) {
            searchBtn.addEventListener('click', () => this.handleSearch());
        }

        if (searchInput) {
            searchInput.addEventListener('keypress', (e) => {
                if (e.key === 'Enter') {
                    this.handleSearch();
                }
            });

            // è¾“å…¥æç¤º
            searchInput.addEventListener('focus', () => {
                this.showSearchTips();
            });
        }

        // ä¸»é¢˜ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
        const topicItems = document.querySelectorAll('.topic-item');
        topicItems.forEach(item => {
            item.addEventListener('click', () => {
                const topic = item.getAttribute('data-topic');
                this.handleTopicClick(topic);
            });
        });

        // å¯¼èˆªé“¾æ¥ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
        const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
        navLinks.forEach(link => {
            link.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                if (link.getAttribute('href').startsWith('pages/')) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    this.showComingSoon(link.textContent);
                }
            });
        });
    }

    handleSearch() {
        const searchInput = document.getElementById('mainSearchInput');
        const question = searchInput.value.trim();

        if (!question) {
            this.showAlert('è¯·è¾“å…¥æ‚¨çš„é—®é¢˜', 'warning');
            return;
        }

        this.showSearchLoading();
        
        // æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæœç´¢è¿‡ç¨‹
        setTimeout(() => {
            this.redirectToAsk(question);
        }, 1000);
    }

    handleTopicClick(topic) {
        const searchInput = document.getElementById('mainSearchInput');
        searchInput.value = topic;
        
        // æ·»åŠ ç‚¹å‡»æ•ˆæœ
        event.currentTarget.style.transform = 'scale(0.98)';
        setTimeout(() => {
            event.currentTarget.style.transform = '';
            this.handleSearch();
        }, 150);
    }

    showSearchLoading() {
        const searchBtn = document.getElementById('mainSearchBtn');
        const originalText = searchBtn.innerHTML;
        
        searchBtn.innerHTML = '<span class="loading-spinner"></span> æœç´¢ä¸­...';
        searchBtn.disabled = true;

        // æ¢å¤æŒ‰é’®çŠ¶æ€
        setTimeout(() => {
            searchBtn.innerHTML = originalText;
            searchBtn.disabled = false;
        }, 1000);
    }

    redirectToAsk(question) {
        // è¿™é‡Œå°†æ¥ä¼šè·³è½¬åˆ°é—®ç­”é¡µé¢
        // ç°åœ¨å…ˆæ˜¾ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªæç¤º
        this.showAlert(`æ­£åœ¨ä¸ºæ‚¨æœç´¢: "${question}"`, 'info');
        console.log('æœç´¢é—®é¢˜:', question);
    }

    showSearchTips() {
        const tips = [
            'ğŸ’¡ è¯•è¯•é—®: "ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½?"',
            'ğŸ” è¯•è¯•é—®: "å¦‚ä½•å­¦ä¹ ç¼–ç¨‹?"',
            'ğŸŒŸ è¯•è¯•é—®: "å®‡å®™æœ‰å¤šå¤§?"',
            'ğŸ“š è¯•è¯•é—®: "å†å²ä¸Šæœ€é‡è¦çš„å‘æ˜æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆ?"'
        ];
        
        const randomTip = tips[Math.floor(Math.random() * tips.length)];
        const searchInput = document.getElementById('mainSearchInput');
        
        if (searchInput.placeholder === 'è¯·è¾“å…¥ä½ çš„é—®é¢˜...') {
            searchInput.placeholder = randomTip;
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                searchInput.placeholder = 'è¯·è¾“å…¥ä½ çš„é—®é¢˜...';
            }, 3000);
        }
    }

    showAlert(message, type = 'info') {
        // åˆ›å»ºæç¤ºæ¡†
        const alertDiv = document.createElement('div');
        alertDiv.className = `alert alert-${type} alert-dismissible fade show position-fixed`;
        alertDiv.style.cssText = 'top: 20px; right: 20px; z-index: 9999; min-width: 300px;';
        
        alertDiv.innerHTML = `
            ${message}
            <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="alert"></button>
        `;
        
        document.body.appendChild(alertDiv);
        
        // è‡ªåŠ¨ç§»é™¤
        setTimeout(() => {
            if (alertDiv.parentNode) {
                alertDiv.remove();
            }
        }, 5000);
    }

    showComingSoon(feature) {
        this.showAlert(`${feature} åŠŸèƒ½å³å°†ä¸Šçº¿ï¼Œæ•¬è¯·æœŸå¾…ï¼`, 'info');
    }

    showWelcomeMessage() {
        console.log('ğŸ± æ¬¢è¿æ¥åˆ° A World of Whys!');
        console.log('ğŸš€ æ–°ä¸€ä»£äº¤äº’å¼çŸ¥è¯†å­¦ä¹ å¼•æ“å·²å¯åŠ¨');
        
        // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯é¦–æ¬¡è®¿é—®
        if (!localStorage.getItem('whys_visited')) {
            setTimeout(() => {
                this.showAlert('æ¬¢è¿æ¥åˆ° A World of Whys! ğŸ‰', 'success');
                localStorage.setItem('whys_visited', 'true');
            }, 1000);
        }
    }
}

// é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆååˆå§‹åŒ–åº”ç”¨
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    new WhysApp();
});

// å¹³æ»‘æ»šåŠ¨æ•ˆæœ
document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
    anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
        if (target) {
            target.scrollIntoView({
                behavior: 'smooth',
                block: 'start'
            });
        }
    });
});
```

### ğŸ¯ **3. æ ‡é¢˜åŒºåŸŸ (Hero Section)**

```html
<section class="hero-section">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="row justify-content-center text-center">
            <div class="col-lg-8">
                <h1 class="hero-title">æ–°ä¸€ä»£äº¤äº’å¼çŸ¥è¯†å­¦ä¹ å¼•æ“</h1>
                <p class="hero-subtitle">æ¢ç´¢æ— é™å¯èƒ½ï¼Œè§£ç­”å¿ƒä¸­ç–‘é—®</p>
```

## ç¬¬1æ­¥ï¼šåˆ›å»ºApiServiceç±»çš„åŸºç¡€ç»“æ„å’Œæ„é€ å‡½æ•°

è¯·æ‰“å¼€ `frontend/js/api.js` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ·»åŠ ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼š

```javascript
/**
 * APIæœåŠ¡ç±» - å¤„ç†ä¸åç«¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰é€šä¿¡
 * A World of Whys - åä¸‡ä¸ªä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆ
 */
class ApiService {
    constructor() {
        // APIåŸºç¡€é…ç½®
        this.baseURL = 'http://localhost:8080';
        this.timeout = 30000; // 30ç§’è¶…æ—¶
        this.isLoading = false;
        
        // é»˜è®¤è¯·æ±‚å¤´
        this.defaultHeaders = {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json',
            'Accept': 'application/json'
        };
        
        console.log('ApiService initialized');
    }
}
```

è¯·å°†è¿™æ®µä»£ç å¤åˆ¶åˆ° `frontend/js/api.js` æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œç„¶åå‘Šè¯‰æˆ‘å®Œæˆäº†ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ç»§ç»­ä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥ã€‚

## ç¬¬2æ­¥ï¼šå®ç°HTTPè¯·æ±‚å°è£…æ–¹æ³•request()

è¯·åœ¨ApiServiceç±»ä¸­æ·»åŠ ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆåœ¨æ„é€ å‡½æ•°åé¢ï¼‰ï¼š

```javascript
    /**
     * é€šç”¨HTTPè¯·æ±‚æ–¹æ³•
     * @param {string} endpoint - APIç«¯ç‚¹
     * @param {Object} options - è¯·æ±‚é€‰é¡¹
     * @returns {Promise} è¯·æ±‚ç»“æœ
     */
    async request(endpoint, options = {}) {
        const url = `${this.baseURL}${endpoint}`;
        
        // åˆå¹¶é»˜è®¤é…ç½®
        const config = {
            method: 'GET',
            headers: { ...this.defaultHeaders },
            ...options
        };
        
        // è®¾ç½®è¶…æ—¶æ§åˆ¶
        const controller = new AbortController();
        const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => controller.abort(), this.timeout);
        config.signal = controller.signal;
        
        try {
            console.log(`APIè¯·æ±‚: ${config.method} ${url}`);
            
            const response = await fetch(url, config);
            clearTimeout(timeoutId);
            
            // æ£€æŸ¥å“åº”çŠ¶æ€
            if (!response.ok) {
                throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`);
            }
            
            // è§£æå“åº”æ•°æ®
            const data = await response.json();
            console.log('APIå“åº”:', data);
            
            return {
                success: true,
                data: data,
                status: response.status
            };
            
        } catch (error) {
            clearTimeout(timeoutId);
            console.error('APIè¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥:', error);
            
            return {
                success: false,
                error: error.message,
                type: this.getErrorType(error)
            };
        }
    }
```

è¯·å°†è¿™æ®µä»£ç æ·»åŠ åˆ°ApiServiceç±»ä¸­ï¼Œç„¶åå‘Šè¯‰æˆ‘å®Œæˆäº†ã€‚

## ç¬¬3-15æ­¥ï¼šå®Œæ•´çš„å‰©ä½™ä»£ç å†…å®¹

è¯·åœ¨ApiServiceç±»ä¸­ç»§ç»­æ·»åŠ ä»¥ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆåœ¨requestæ–¹æ³•åé¢ï¼‰ï¼š

```javascript
    /**
     * è·å–é”™è¯¯ç±»å‹
     * @param {Error} error - é”™è¯¯å¯¹è±¡
     * @returns {string} é”™è¯¯ç±»å‹
     */
    getErrorType(error) {
        if (error.name === 'AbortError') return 'timeout';
        if (error.message.includes('Failed to fetch')) return 'network';
        if (error.message.includes('HTTP')) return 'server';
        return 'unknown';
    }

    /**
     * ç»Ÿä¸€é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†æ–¹æ³•
     * @param {Object} errorResult - é”™è¯¯ç»“æœå¯¹è±¡
     * @returns {string} ç”¨æˆ·å‹å¥½çš„é”™è¯¯æ¶ˆæ¯
     */
    handleError(errorResult) {
        const { error, type } = errorResult;
        
        switch (type) {
            case 'timeout':
                return 'è¯·æ±‚è¶…æ—¶ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œè¿æ¥åé‡è¯•';
            case 'network':
                return 'ç½‘ç»œè¿æ¥å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œè®¾ç½®';
            case 'server':
                return `æœåŠ¡å™¨é”™è¯¯ï¼š${error}`;
            default:
                return `æœªçŸ¥é”™è¯¯ï¼š${error}`;
        }
    }

    /**
     * è®¾ç½®åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
     * @param {boolean} loading - æ˜¯å¦åŠ è½½ä¸­
     */
    setLoading(loading) {
        this.isLoading = loading;
        
        // è§¦å‘åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€å˜åŒ–äº‹ä»¶
        const event = new CustomEvent('apiLoadingChange', {
            detail: { isLoading: loading }
        });
        document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    /**
     * æ£€æŸ¥åç«¯APIçŠ¶æ€
     * @returns {Promise} APIçŠ¶æ€ç»“æœ
     */
    async checkApiStatus() {
        this.setLoading(true);
        
        try {
            const result = await this.request('/api/status');
            return result;
        } finally {
            this.setLoading(false);
        }
    }

    /**
     * æµ‹è¯•é€šä¹‰åƒé—®è¿æ¥
     * @returns {Promise} è¿æ¥æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœ
     */
    async testQwenConnection() {
        this.setLoading(true);
        
        try {
            const result = await this.request('/api/test-qwen');
            return result;
        } finally {
            this.setLoading(false);
        }
    }

    /**
     * å‘é€é—®é¢˜è·å–AIç­”æ¡ˆ
     * @param {string} question - ç”¨æˆ·é—®é¢˜
     * @returns {Promise} é—®ç­”ç»“æœ
     */
    async askQuestion(question) {
        if (!question || question.trim() === '') {
            return {
                success: false,
                error: 'é—®é¢˜ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º',
                type: 'validation'
            };
        }

        // é˜²é‡å¤æäº¤
        if (this.isLoading) {
            return {
                success: false,
                error: 'è¯·ç­‰å¾…å½“å‰è¯·æ±‚å®Œæˆ',
                type: 'duplicate'
            };
        }

        this.setLoading(true);
        
        try {
            const encodedQuestion = encodeURIComponent(question.trim());
            const result = await this.request(`/api/ask?q=${encodedQuestion}`);
            return result;
        } finally {
            this.setLoading(false);
        }
    }

    /**
     * è·å–AIæ¨¡å‹ä¿¡æ¯
     * @returns {Promise} æ¨¡å‹ä¿¡æ¯ç»“æœ
     */
    async getModelInfo() {
        this.setLoading(true);
        
        try {
            const result = await this.request('/api/model-info');
            return result;
        } finally {
            this.setLoading(false);
        }
    }

    /**
     * ç”Ÿæˆå­¦ä¹ å†…å®¹
     * @param {string} topic - å­¦ä¹ ä¸»é¢˜
     * @returns {Promise} å­¦ä¹ å†…å®¹ç»“æœ
     */
    async generateLearningContent(topic) {
        if (!topic || topic.trim() === '') {
            return {
                success: false,
                error: 'å­¦ä¹ ä¸»é¢˜ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º',
                type: 'validation'
            };
        }

        // é˜²é‡å¤æäº¤
        if (this.isLoading) {
            return {
                success: false,
                error: 'è¯·ç­‰å¾…å½“å‰è¯·æ±‚å®Œæˆ',
                type: 'duplicate'
            };
        }

        this.setLoading(true);
        
        try {
            const encodedTopic = encodeURIComponent(topic.trim());
            const result = await this.request(`/api/learn?topic=${encodedTopic}`);
            return result;
        } finally {
            this.setLoading(false);
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ‰¹é‡æµ‹è¯•æ‰€æœ‰APIç«¯ç‚¹
     * @returns {Promise} æµ‹è¯•ç»“æœ
     */
    async testAllEndpoints() {
        console.log('å¼€å§‹æµ‹è¯•æ‰€æœ‰APIç«¯ç‚¹...');
        
        const tests = [
            { name: 'APIçŠ¶æ€æ£€æŸ¥', method: () => this.checkApiStatus() },
            { name: 'é€šä¹‰åƒé—®è¿æ¥æµ‹è¯•', method: () => this.testQwenConnection() },
            { name: 'æ¨¡å‹ä¿¡æ¯è·å–', method: () => this.getModelInfo() }
        ];
        
        const results = [];
        
        for (const test of tests) {
            try {
                console.log(`æµ‹è¯•: ${test.name}`);
                const result = await test.method();
                results.push({
                    name: test.name,
                    success: result.success,
                    data: result.success ? result.data : result.error
                });
            } catch (error) {
                results.push({
                    name: test.name,
                    success: false,
                    data: error.message
                });
            }
        }
        
        console.log('APIæµ‹è¯•å®Œæˆ:', results);
        return results;
    }
}

// åˆ›å»ºå…¨å±€ApiServiceå®ä¾‹
const apiService = new ApiService();

    const { isLoading } = event.detail;
    console.log('APIåŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€:', isLoading ? 'åŠ è½½ä¸­...' : 'å®Œæˆ');
    
    // å¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™é‡Œæ›´æ–°UIåŠ è½½æŒ‡ç¤ºå™¨
    const loadingElements = document.querySelectorAll('.api-loading');
    loadingElements.forEach(element => {
        element.style.display = isLoading ? 'block' : 'none';
    });
});

// å¯¼å‡ºä¾›å…¶ä»–æ¨¡å—ä½¿ç”¨
if (typeof module !== 'undefined' && module.exports) {
    module.exports = { ApiService, apiService };
```

## ç¬¬16æ­¥ï¼šåœ¨main.jsä¸­é›†æˆAPIè°ƒç”¨åŠŸèƒ½

ç°åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ä¿®æ”¹ `frontend/js/main.js` æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå°†APIè°ƒç”¨åŠŸèƒ½é›†æˆåˆ°ç°æœ‰çš„æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½ä¸­ã€‚

è¯·åœ¨ `frontend/js/main.js` æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ° `handleSearch` æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå°†å…¶æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼š

```javascript
    /**
     * å¤„ç†æœç´¢è¯·æ±‚
     * @param {string} query - æœç´¢æŸ¥è¯¢
     */
    async handleSearch(query) {
        if (!query || query.trim() === '') {
            this.showMessage('è¯·è¾“å…¥æ‚¨çš„é—®é¢˜', 'warning');
            return;
        }

        const trimmedQuery = query.trim();
        console.log('å¼€å§‹æœç´¢:', trimmedQuery);

        // æ˜¾ç¤ºåŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
        this.showLoading(true);
        this.showMessage('æ­£åœ¨æ€è€ƒæ‚¨çš„é—®é¢˜...', 'info');

        try {
            // è°ƒç”¨APIè·å–ç­”æ¡ˆ
            const result = await apiService.askQuestion(trimmedQuery);
            
            if (result.success) {
                // æˆåŠŸè·å–ç­”æ¡ˆ
                this.showMessage('è·å–ç­”æ¡ˆæˆåŠŸï¼', 'success');
                this.displayAnswer(result.data, trimmedQuery);
            } else {
                // APIè°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥
                const errorMsg = apiService.handleError(result);
                this.showMessage(errorMsg, 'danger');
                console.error('APIè°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥:', result);
            }
        } catch (error) {
            // æ„å¤–é”™è¯¯
            console.error('æœç´¢è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯:', error);
            this.showMessage('æœç´¢è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿæ„å¤–é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•', 'danger');
        } finally {
            // éšè—åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
            this.showLoading(false);
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤ºç­”æ¡ˆå†…å®¹
     * @param {Object} data - APIè¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®
     * @param {string} question - åŸå§‹é—®é¢˜
     */
    displayAnswer(data, question) {
        // åˆ›å»ºç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¾ç¤ºåŒºåŸŸ
        let answerSection = document.getElementById('answerSection');
        
        if (!answerSection) {
            answerSection = document.createElement('section');
            answerSection.id = 'answerSection';
            answerSection.className = 'answer-section mt-5';
            
            // æ’å…¥åˆ°æœç´¢åŒºåŸŸåé¢
            const searchSection = document.querySelector('.search-section');
            searchSection.parentNode.insertBefore(answerSection, searchSection.nextSibling);
        }

        // æ„å»ºç­”æ¡ˆHTML
        answerSection.innerHTML = `
            <div class="container">
                <div class="row justify-content-center">
                    <div class="col-lg-10">
                        <div class="answer-card">
                            <div class="answer-header">
                                <h3><i class="bi bi-chat-dots-fill"></i> æ‚¨çš„é—®é¢˜</h3>
                                <p class="question-text">${this.escapeHtml(question)}</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="answer-content">
                                <h4><i class="bi bi-robot"></i> AIåŠ©æ‰‹å›ç­”</h4>
                                <div class="answer-text">
                                    ${this.formatAnswer(data)}
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="answer-actions">
                                <button class="btn btn-outline-primary btn-sm" onclick="whysApp.copyAnswer()">
                                    <i class="bi bi-clipboard"></i> å¤åˆ¶ç­”æ¡ˆ
                                </button>
                                <button class="btn btn-outline-secondary btn-sm" onclick="whysApp.newSearch()">
                                    <i class="bi bi-arrow-clockwise"></i> æ–°çš„æœç´¢
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        `;

        // æ»šåŠ¨åˆ°ç­”æ¡ˆåŒºåŸŸ
        answerSection.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
    }

    /**
     * æ ¼å¼åŒ–ç­”æ¡ˆå†…å®¹
     * @param {Object} data - APIè¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®
     * @returns {string} æ ¼å¼åŒ–åçš„HTML
     */
    formatAnswer(data) {
        // æ ¹æ®åç«¯è¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„è¿›è¡Œæ ¼å¼åŒ–
        if (typeof data === 'string') {
            return `<p>${this.escapeHtml(data)}</p>`;
        } else if (data && data.answer) {
            return `<p>${this.escapeHtml(data.answer)}</p>`;
        } else if (data && data.content) {
            return `<p>${this.escapeHtml(data.content)}</p>`;
        } else {
            return `<p>${this.escapeHtml(JSON.stringify(data))}</p>`;
        }
    }

    /**
     * HTMLè½¬ä¹‰
     * @param {string} text - éœ€è¦è½¬ä¹‰çš„æ–‡æœ¬
     * @returns {string} è½¬ä¹‰åçš„æ–‡æœ¬
     */
    escapeHtml(text) {
        const div = document.createElement('div');
        div.textContent = text;
        return div.innerHTML;
    }

    /**
     * å¤åˆ¶ç­”æ¡ˆåˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿
     */
    async copyAnswer() {
        const answerText = document.querySelector('.answer-text');
        if (answerText) {
            try {
                await navigator.clipboard.writeText(answerText.textContent);
                this.showMessage('ç­”æ¡ˆå·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿', 'success');
            } catch (error) {
                console.error('å¤åˆ¶å¤±è´¥:', error);
                this.showMessage('å¤åˆ¶å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·æ‰‹åŠ¨é€‰æ‹©æ–‡æœ¬å¤åˆ¶', 'warning');
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * å¼€å§‹æ–°çš„æœç´¢
     */
    newSearch() {
        // æ¸…ç©ºæœç´¢æ¡†
        const searchInput = document.getElementById('mainSearchInput');
        if (searchInput) {
            searchInput.value = '';
            searchInput.focus();
        }

        // éšè—ç­”æ¡ˆåŒºåŸŸ
        const answerSection = document.getElementById('answerSection');
        if (answerSection) {
            answerSection.style.display = 'none';
        }

        this.showMessage('è¯·è¾“å…¥æ–°çš„é—®é¢˜', 'info');
    }

    /**
     * æ˜¾ç¤º/éšè—åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
     * @param {boolean} show - æ˜¯å¦æ˜¾ç¤ºåŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
     */
    showLoading(show) {
        const searchBtn = document.getElementById('mainSearchBtn');
        const searchInput = document.getElementById('mainSearchInput');
        
        if (show) {
            searchBtn.innerHTML = '<span class="spinner-border spinner-border-sm me-2"></span>æ€è€ƒä¸­...';
            searchBtn.disabled = true;
            searchInput.disabled = true;
        } else {
            searchBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="bi bi-search"></i> å¼€å§‹å­¦ä¹ ';
            searchBtn.disabled = false;
            searchInput.disabled = false;
        }
    }
```

```diff
+ /**
+  * APIæœåŠ¡ç±» - å¤„ç†ä¸åç«¯çš„æ‰€æœ‰é€šä¿¡
+  * A World of Whys - åä¸‡ä¸ªä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆ
+  */
+ class ApiService {
+     constructor() {
+         // APIåŸºç¡€é…ç½®
+         this.baseURL = 'http://localhost:8080';
+         this.timeout = 30000; // 30ç§’è¶…æ—¶
+         this.isLoading = false;
+         
+         // é»˜è®¤è¯·æ±‚å¤´
+         this.defaultHeaders = {
+             'Content-Type': 'application/json',
+             'Accept': 'application/json'
+         };
+         
+         console.log('ApiService initialized');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é€šç”¨HTTPè¯·æ±‚æ–¹æ³•
+      * @param {string} endpoint - APIç«¯ç‚¹
+      * @param {Object} options - è¯·æ±‚é€‰é¡¹
+      * @returns {Promise} è¯·æ±‚ç»“æœ
+      */
+     async request(endpoint, options = {}) {
+         const url = `${this.baseURL}${endpoint}`;
+         
+         // åˆå¹¶é»˜è®¤é…ç½®
+         const config = {
+             method: 'GET',
+             headers: { ...this.defaultHeaders },
+             ...options
+         };
+         
+         // è®¾ç½®è¶…æ—¶æ§åˆ¶
+         const controller = new AbortController();
+         const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => controller.abort(), this.timeout);
+         config.signal = controller.signal;
+         
+         try {
+             console.log(`APIè¯·æ±‚: ${config.method} ${url}`);
+             
+             const response = await fetch(url, config);
+             clearTimeout(timeoutId);
+             
+             // æ£€æŸ¥å“åº”çŠ¶æ€
+             if (!response.ok) {
+                 throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`);
+             }
+             
+             // è§£æå“åº”æ•°æ®
+             const data = await response.json();
+             console.log('APIå“åº”:', data);
+             
+             return {
+                 success: true,
+                 data: data,
+                 status: response.status
+             };
+             
+         } catch (error) {
+             clearTimeout(timeoutId);
+             console.error('APIè¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥:', error);
+             
+             return {
+                 success: false,
+                 error: error.message,
+                 type: this.getErrorType(error)
+             };
+         }
+     }
```

```diff

+ #!/usr/bin/env python3
+ """
+ ç®€å•çš„HTTPæœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œç”¨äºæä¾›å‰ç«¯æ–‡ä»¶
+ è§£å†³CORSè·¨åŸŸé—®é¢˜

+ import os
+ import sys
+ 
+ # è®¾ç½®ç«¯å£
+ PORT = 3000
+ 
+ # åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°å‰ç«¯ç›®å½•

+ 
+ class CORSHTTPRequestHandler(http.server.SimpleHTTPRequestHandler):
+     def end_headers(self):
+         self.send_header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', '*')
+         self.send_header('Access-Control-Allow-Methods', 'GET, POST, OPTIONS')
+         self.send_header('Access-Control-Allow-Headers', '*')
+         super().end_headers()
+     
+     def do_OPTIONS(self):
+         self.send_response(200)
+         self.end_headers()
+ 
+ # åˆ›å»ºæœåŠ¡å™¨
+ with socketserver.TCPServer(("", PORT), CORSHTTPRequestHandler) as httpd:
+     print(f"ğŸŒ å‰ç«¯æœåŠ¡å™¨å¯åŠ¨æˆåŠŸ!")
+     print(f"ğŸ“ æœåŠ¡ç›®å½•: {frontend_dir}")

+     print(f"â¹ï¸  æŒ‰ Ctrl+C åœæ­¢æœåŠ¡å™¨")
+     print("-" * 50)
+     
+     try:
+         httpd.serve_forever()
+     except KeyboardInterrupt:
+         print("\nğŸ›‘ æœåŠ¡å™¨å·²åœæ­¢")
+         sys.exit(0)
```

### ğŸ”§ **é—®é¢˜åˆ†æ**

### ğŸ› ï¸ **æ ¸å¿ƒä¿®æ”¹å†…å®¹**

#### **1. åˆ›å»ºMarkdownè§£æå™¨**
**æ–‡ä»¶**ï¼š`frontend/js/main.js`

**æ–°å¢parseMarkdownæ–¹æ³•**ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå®Œæ•´çš„Markdownè¯­æ³•ï¼š

```javascript
parseMarkdown(text) {
    // HTMLè½¬ä¹‰é˜²æ­¢XSSæ”»å‡»
    let html = text.replace(/&/g, '&amp;')...
    
    // è§£æå„ç§Markdownè¯­æ³•
    html = html
        .replace(/^### (.*$)/gm, '<h5>$1</h5>')    // ä¸‰çº§æ ‡é¢˜
        .replace(/^## (.*$)/gm, '<h4>$1</h4>')     // äºŒçº§æ ‡é¢˜  
        .replace(/^# (.*$)/gm, '<h3>$1</h3>')      // ä¸€çº§æ ‡é¢˜
        .replace(/\*\*(.*?)\*\*/g, '<strong>$1</strong>') // ç²—ä½“
        .replace(/\*(.*?)\*/g, '<em>$1</em>')      // æ–œä½“
        .replace(/```([\s\S]*?)```/g, '<pre><code>$1</code></pre>') // ä»£ç å—
        .replace(/`([^`]+)`/g, '<code>$1</code>')  // è¡Œå†…ä»£ç 
        .replace(/^[\s]*[-*]\s+(.+)$/gm, '<li>$1</li>') // æ— åºåˆ—è¡¨
        .replace(/^[\s]*\d+\.\s+(.+)$/gm, '<li>$1</li>') // æœ‰åºåˆ—è¡¨
        .replace(/\[([^\]]+)\]\(([^)]+)\)/g, '<a href="$2" target="_blank">$1</a>') // é“¾æ¥
        .replace(/^[\s]*---[\s]*$/gm, '<hr>');     // åˆ†å‰²çº¿
    
    return html;
}
```

```javascript
// ä¿®æ”¹åï¼šå®Œæ•´Markdownè§£æ
formatAnswer(data) {
```

```diff
+ package com.zhimiao.controller;
+ 
+ import com.zhimiao.service.SearchService;
+ import com.zhimiao.dto.SearchResultDTO;
+ import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
+ import org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;
+ import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
+ import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;
+ import java.util.HashMap;
+ import java.util.List;
+ import java.util.Map;
+ 
+ @RestController
+ @CrossOrigin(origins = "*", maxAge = 3600)
+ @RequestMapping("/api")
+ public class SearchController {
+ 
+     @Autowired
+     private SearchService searchService;
+ 
+     /**
+      * æœç´¢ç›¸å…³å­¦ä¹ æ¨¡å—
+      * @param keyword æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯
+      * @param page é¡µç ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸º0ï¼‰
+      * @param size æ¯é¡µå¤§å°ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸º10ï¼‰
+      * @return æœç´¢ç»“æœ
+      */
+     @GetMapping("/search")
+     public ResponseEntity<Map<String, Object>> searchModules(
+             @RequestParam("q") String keyword,
+             @RequestParam(value = "page", defaultValue = "0") int page,
+             @RequestParam(value = "size", defaultValue = "10") int size) {
+         
+         try {
+             if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {
+                 Map<String, Object> errorResponse = new HashMap<>();
+                 errorResponse.put("success", false);
+                 errorResponse.put("error", "æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º");
+                 errorResponse.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+                 return ResponseEntity.badRequest().body(errorResponse);
+             }
+ 
+             // è°ƒç”¨æœç´¢æœåŠ¡
+             List<SearchResultDTO> modules = searchService.searchModules(keyword.trim(), page, size);
+             
+             Map<String, Object> response = new HashMap<>();
+             response.put("success", true);
+             response.put("keyword", keyword.trim());
+             response.put("modules", modules);
+             response.put("total", modules.size());
+             response.put("page", page);
+             response.put("size", size);
+             response.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+             
+             return ResponseEntity.ok(response);
+             
+         } catch (Exception e) {
+             Map<String, Object> errorResponse = new HashMap<>();
+             errorResponse.put("success", false);
+             errorResponse.put("error", "æœç´¢è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: " + e.getMessage());
+             errorResponse.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+             return ResponseEntity.status(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR).body(errorResponse);
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·å–æœç´¢å»ºè®®
+      * @param keyword è¾“å…¥çš„å…³é”®è¯
+      * @return æœç´¢å»ºè®®åˆ—è¡¨
+      */
+     @GetMapping("/search/suggestions")
+     public ResponseEntity<Map<String, Object>> getSearchSuggestions(
+             @RequestParam("q") String keyword) {
+         
+         try {
+             if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {
+                 Map<String, Object> response = new HashMap<>();
+                 response.put("success", true);
+                 response.put("suggestions", List.of());
+                 response.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+                 return ResponseEntity.ok(response);
+             }
+ 
+             // è°ƒç”¨æœç´¢æœåŠ¡è·å–å»ºè®®
+             List<String> suggestions = searchService.getSearchSuggestions(keyword.trim());
+             
+             Map<String, Object> response = new HashMap<>();
+             response.put("success", true);
+             response.put("keyword", keyword.trim());
+             response.put("suggestions", suggestions);
+             response.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+             
+             return ResponseEntity.ok(response);
+             
+         } catch (Exception e) {
+             Map<String, Object> errorResponse = new HashMap<>();
+             errorResponse.put("success", false);
+             errorResponse.put("error", "è·å–æœç´¢å»ºè®®æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: " + e.getMessage());
+             errorResponse.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+             return ResponseEntity.status(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR).body(errorResponse);
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·å–çƒ­é—¨æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯
+      * @return çƒ­é—¨æœç´¢åˆ—è¡¨
+      */
+     @GetMapping("/search/trending")
+     public ResponseEntity<Map<String, Object>> getTrendingSearches() {
+         try {
+             List<String> trendingSearches = searchService.getTrendingSearches();
+             
+             Map<String, Object> response = new HashMap<>();
+             response.put("success", true);
+             response.put("trending", trendingSearches);
+             response.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+             
+             return ResponseEntity.ok(response);
+             
+         } catch (Exception e) {
+             Map<String, Object> errorResponse = new HashMap<>();
+             errorResponse.put("success", false);
+             errorResponse.put("error", "è·å–çƒ­é—¨æœç´¢æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: " + e.getMessage());
+             errorResponse.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+             return ResponseEntity.status(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR).body(errorResponse);
+         }
+     }
+ }
```

```diff
+ package com.zhimiao.controller;
+ 
+ import com.zhimiao.service.ModuleService;
+ import com.zhimiao.dto.ModuleDTO;
+ import com.zhimiao.dto.ChapterDTO;
+ import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
+ import org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;
+ import org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;
+ import org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;
+ import java.util.HashMap;
+ import java.util.List;
+ import java.util.Map;
+ 
+ @RestController
+ @CrossOrigin(origins = "*", maxAge = 3600)
+ @RequestMapping("/api")
+ public class ModuleController {
+ 
+     @Autowired
+     private ModuleService moduleService;
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·å–æ¨¡å—è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯
+      * @param moduleId æ¨¡å—ID
+      * @return æ¨¡å—è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯
+      */
+     @GetMapping("/modules/{moduleId}")
+     public ResponseEntity<Map<String, Object>> getModuleDetails(@PathVariable String moduleId) {
+         try {
+             if (moduleId == null || moduleId.trim().isEmpty()) {
+                 Map<String, Object> errorResponse = new HashMap<>();
+                 errorResponse.put("success", false);
+                 errorResponse.put("error", "æ¨¡å—IDä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º");
+                 errorResponse.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+                 return ResponseEntity.badRequest().body(errorResponse);
+             }
+ 
+             ModuleDTO module = moduleService.getModuleById(moduleId.trim());
+             
+             if (module == null) {
+                 Map<String, Object> errorResponse = new HashMap<>();
+                 errorResponse.put("success", false);
+                 errorResponse.put("error", "æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æŒ‡å®šçš„å­¦ä¹ æ¨¡å—");
+                 errorResponse.put("moduleId", moduleId);
+                 errorResponse.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+                 return ResponseEntity.notFound().build();
+             }
+ 
+             Map<String, Object> response = new HashMap<>();
+             response.put("success", true);
+             response.put("module", module);
+             response.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+             
+             return ResponseEntity.ok(response);
+             
+         } catch (Exception e) {
+             Map<String, Object> errorResponse = new HashMap<>();
+             errorResponse.put("success", false);
+             errorResponse.put("error", "è·å–æ¨¡å—è¯¦æƒ…æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: " + e.getMessage());

+         try {
+             if (moduleId == null || moduleId.trim().isEmpty()) {
+                 Map<String, Object> errorResponse = new HashMap<>();
+                 errorResponse.put("success", false);
+                 errorResponse.put("error", "æ¨¡å—IDä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º");
+                 errorResponse.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+                 return ResponseEntity.badRequest().body(errorResponse);
+             }
+ 
+             List<ChapterDTO> chapters = moduleService.getModuleChapters(moduleId.trim());
+             
+             Map<String, Object> response = new HashMap<>();
+             response.put("success", true);
+             response.put("moduleId", moduleId);
+             response.put("chapters", chapters);
+             response.put("total", chapters.size());
+             response.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+             
+             return ResponseEntity.ok(response);
+             
+         } catch (Exception e) {
+             Map<String, Object> errorResponse = new HashMap<>();
+             errorResponse.put("success", false);
+             errorResponse.put("error", "è·å–ç« èŠ‚åˆ—è¡¨æ—¶å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯: " + e.getMessage());
+             errorResponse.put("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
+             return ResponseEntity.status(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR).body(errorResponse);
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å¯ç”¨æ¨¡å—
+      * @param category åˆ†ç±»ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰

+      * @return æ¨¡å—åˆ—è¡¨

+     @GetMapping("/modules")
```

```diff
+ /**
+  * æœç´¢ç»“æœé¡µé¢é€»è¾‘
+  * A World of Whys - åä¸‡ä¸ªä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆ
+  */
+ 
+ class SearchResultsApp {
+     constructor() {
+         this.currentKeyword = '';
+         this.currentResults = [];
+         this.filters = {
+             difficulty: '',
+             category: '',
+             sort: 'relevance'
+         };
+         this.init();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆå§‹åŒ–åº”ç”¨
+      */
+     init() {
+         console.log('SearchResultsApp åˆå§‹åŒ–...');
+         
+         // è·å–URLå‚æ•°ä¸­çš„æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯
+         this.currentKeyword = this.getUrlParameter('q');
+         
+         if (this.currentKeyword) {
+             // æ˜¾ç¤ºæœç´¢å…³é”®è¯
+             this.displaySearchKeyword();
+             // æ‰§è¡Œæœç´¢
+             this.performSearch();
+         } else {
+             // æ²¡æœ‰æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºé”™è¯¯
+             this.showError('ç¼ºå°‘æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯');
+         }
+ 
+         // ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶
+         this.bindEvents();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
+      */
+     bindEvents() {
+         // è¿”å›é¦–é¡µæŒ‰é’®
+         const backBtn = document.getElementById('backBtn');
+         if (backBtn) {
+             backBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
+                 window.location.href = '../index.html';
+             });
+         }
+ 
+         // æ–°æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½
+         const searchBtn = document.getElementById('searchBtn');
+         const searchInput = document.getElementById('searchInput');
+         
+         if (searchBtn) {
+             searchBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
+                 const newKeyword = searchInput?.value?.trim();
+                 if (newKeyword) {
+                     this.newSearch(newKeyword);
+                 }
+             });
+         }
+ 
+         if (searchInput) {
+             searchInput.addEventListener('keypress', (e) => {
+                 if (e.key === 'Enter') {
+                     const newKeyword = searchInput.value.trim();
+                     if (newKeyword) {
+                         this.newSearch(newKeyword);
+                     }
+                 }
+             });
+         }
+ 
+         // ç­›é€‰å™¨äº‹ä»¶
+         this.bindFilterEvents();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç»‘å®šç­›é€‰å™¨äº‹ä»¶
+      */
+     bindFilterEvents() {
+         const difficultyFilter = document.getElementById('difficultyFilter');
+         const categoryFilter = document.getElementById('categoryFilter');
+         const sortFilter = document.getElementById('sortFilter');
+         const clearFiltersBtn = document.getElementById('clearFiltersBtn');
+ 
+         if (difficultyFilter) {
+             difficultyFilter.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
+                 this.filters.difficulty = e.target.value;
+                 this.applyFilters();
+             });
+         }
+ 
+         if (categoryFilter) {
+             categoryFilter.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
+                 this.filters.category = e.target.value;
+                 this.applyFilters();
+             });
+         }
+ 
+         if (sortFilter) {
+             sortFilter.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
+                 this.filters.sort = e.target.value;
+                 this.applyFilters();
+             });
+         }
+ 
+         if (clearFiltersBtn) {
+             clearFiltersBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
+                 this.clearFilters();
+             });
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è·å–URLå‚æ•°
+      * @param {string} name - å‚æ•°å
+      * @returns {string} å‚æ•°å€¼
+      */
+     getUrlParameter(name) {
+         const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
+         return urlParams.get(name) || '';
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºæœç´¢å…³é”®è¯
+      */
+     displaySearchKeyword() {
+         const keywordElement = document.getElementById('searchKeyword');
+         const searchInput = document.getElementById('searchInput');
+         
+         if (keywordElement) {
+             keywordElement.textContent = this.currentKeyword;
+         }
+         
+         if (searchInput) {
+             searchInput.value = this.currentKeyword;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ‰§è¡Œæœç´¢
+      */
+     async performSearch() {
+         try {
+             console.log('æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯:', this.currentKeyword);
+             
+             // æ˜¾ç¤ºåŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
+             this.showLoading(true);
+             this.updateSearchStats('æ­£åœ¨æœç´¢ç›¸å…³å­¦ä¹ æ¨¡å—...');
+ 
+             // è°ƒç”¨æœç´¢API
+             const result = await apiService.request(`/api/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(this.currentKeyword)}`);
+             
+             if (result.success && result.data) {
+                 this.currentResults = result.data.modules || [];
+                 this.displayResults(this.currentResults);
+                 this.updateSearchStats(`æ‰¾åˆ° ${this.currentResults.length} ä¸ªç›¸å…³å­¦ä¹ æ¨¡å—`);
+             } else {
+                 console.error('æœç´¢å¤±è´¥:', result);
+                 this.showError('æœç´¢å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•');
+             }
+             
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('æœç´¢è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯:', error);
+             this.showError('æœç´¢è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å‘ç”Ÿé”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•');
+         } finally {
+             this.showLoading(false);
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºæœç´¢ç»“æœ
+      * @param {Array} results - æœç´¢ç»“æœæ•°ç»„
+      */
+     displayResults(results) {
+         const resultsContainer = document.getElementById('resultsContainer');
+         const emptyResults = document.getElementById('emptyResults');
+         
+         if (!results || results.length === 0) {
+             // æ˜¾ç¤ºç©ºç»“æœ
+             if (resultsContainer) resultsContainer.style.display = 'none';
+             if (emptyResults) emptyResults.style.display = 'block';
+             return;
+         }
+ 
+         // éšè—ç©ºç»“æœï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºç»“æœå®¹å™¨
+         if (emptyResults) emptyResults.style.display = 'none';
+         if (resultsContainer) {
+             resultsContainer.style.display = 'block';
+             resultsContainer.innerHTML = this.generateResultsHTML(results);
+         }
+ 
+         // ç»‘å®šæ¨¡å—å¡ç‰‡äº‹ä»¶
+         this.bindModuleCardEvents();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç”Ÿæˆæœç´¢ç»“æœHTML
+      * @param {Array} results - æœç´¢ç»“æœæ•°ç»„
+      * @returns {string} HTMLå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
+      */
+     generateResultsHTML(results) {
+         return results.map(module => this.generateModuleCardHTML(module)).join('');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç”Ÿæˆå•ä¸ªæ¨¡å—å¡ç‰‡HTML
+      * @param {Object} module - æ¨¡å—æ•°æ®
+      * @returns {string} HTMLå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
+      */
+     generateModuleCardHTML(module) {
+         const difficultyClass = `difficulty-${module.difficulty}`;
+         const difficultyText = this.getDifficultyText(module.difficulty);
+         const starsHTML = this.generateStarsHTML(module.rating);
+         const tagsHTML = module.tags?.map(tag => `<span class="tag">${tag}</span>`).join('') || '';
+ 
+         return `
+             <div class="module-card" data-module-id="${module.moduleId}">
+                 <div class="module-header">
+                     <div class="module-thumbnail">
+                         ${this.getModuleIcon(module.category)}
+                     </div>
+                     <div class="module-info">
+                         <h3 class="module-title">${module.title}</h3>
+                         <p class="module-description">${module.description}</p>
+                     </div>
+                 </div>
+                 
+                 <div class="module-meta">
+                     <div class="meta-item">
+                         <i class="bi bi-clock"></i>
+                         <span>${module.estimatedTime}</span>
+                     </div>
+                     <div class="meta-item">
+                         <span class="difficulty-badge ${difficultyClass}">${difficultyText}</span>
+                     </div>
+                     <div class="meta-item">
+                         <i class="bi bi-folder"></i>
+                         <span>${this.getCategoryText(module.category)}</span>
+                     </div>
+                 </div>
+                 
+                 <div class="module-tags">
+                     ${tagsHTML}
+                 </div>
+                 
+                 <div class="module-footer">
+                     <div class="module-rating">
+                         <span class="rating-stars">${starsHTML}</span>
+                         <span class="rating-score">${module.rating}</span>
+                         <span class="rating-count">(${module.reviewCount})</span>
+                     </div>
+                     <div class="module-actions">
+                         <button class="btn btn-start-learning" data-module-id="${module.moduleId}">
+                             <i class="bi bi-play-circle"></i> å¼€å§‹å­¦ä¹ 
+                         </button>
+                         <button class="btn btn-preview" data-module-id="${module.moduleId}">
+                             <i class="bi bi-eye"></i> é¢„è§ˆ
+                         </button>
+                     </div>
+                 </div>
+             </div>
+         `;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç»‘å®šæ¨¡å—å¡ç‰‡äº‹ä»¶
+      */
+     bindModuleCardEvents() {
+         // å¼€å§‹å­¦ä¹ æŒ‰é’®
+         const startBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.btn-start-learning');
+         startBtns.forEach(btn => {
+             btn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
+                 e.stopPropagation();
+                 const moduleId = btn.getAttribute('data-module-id');
+                 this.startLearning(moduleId);
+             });
+         });
+ 
+         // é¢„è§ˆæŒ‰é’®
+         const previewBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.btn-preview');
+         previewBtns.forEach(btn => {
+             btn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
+                 e.stopPropagation();
+                 const moduleId = btn.getAttribute('data-module-id');
+                 this.previewModule(moduleId);
+             });
+         });
+ 
+         // æ¨¡å—å¡ç‰‡ç‚¹å‡»
+         const moduleCards = document.querySelectorAll('.module-card');
+         moduleCards.forEach(card => {
+             card.addEventListener('click', () => {
+                 const moduleId = card.getAttribute('data-module-id');
+                 this.startLearning(moduleId);
+             });
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¼€å§‹å­¦ä¹ æ¨¡å—
+      * @param {string} moduleId - æ¨¡å—ID
+      */
+     startLearning(moduleId) {
+         console.log('å¼€å§‹å­¦ä¹ æ¨¡å—:', moduleId);
+         // è·³è½¬åˆ°å­¦ä¹ é¡µé¢
+         window.location.href = `learning.html?module=${moduleId}`;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é¢„è§ˆæ¨¡å—
+      * @param {string} moduleId - æ¨¡å—ID
+      */
+     previewModule(moduleId) {
+         console.log('é¢„è§ˆæ¨¡å—:', moduleId);
+         // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¨¡å—é¢„è§ˆå¼¹çª—
+         alert(`é¢„è§ˆæ¨¡å—: ${moduleId}\næ­¤åŠŸèƒ½å³å°†ä¸Šçº¿ï¼`);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åº”ç”¨ç­›é€‰å™¨
+      */
+     applyFilters() {
+         let filteredResults = [...this.currentResults];
+ 
+         // éš¾åº¦ç­›é€‰
+         if (this.filters.difficulty) {
+             filteredResults = filteredResults.filter(module => 
+                 module.difficulty === this.filters.difficulty
+             );
+         }
+ 
+         // åˆ†ç±»ç­›é€‰
+         if (this.filters.category) {
+             filteredResults = filteredResults.filter(module => 
+                 module.category === this.filters.category
+             );
+         }
+ 
+         // æ’åº
+         filteredResults = this.sortResults(filteredResults, this.filters.sort);
+ 
+         // æ˜¾ç¤ºç­›é€‰åçš„ç»“æœ
+         this.displayResults(filteredResults);
+         this.updateSearchStats(`æ‰¾åˆ° ${filteredResults.length} ä¸ªç›¸å…³å­¦ä¹ æ¨¡å—`);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ¸…é™¤ç­›é€‰å™¨
+      */
+     clearFilters() {
+         this.filters = {
+             difficulty: '',
+             category: '',
+             sort: 'relevance'
+         };
+ 
+         // é‡ç½®ç­›é€‰å™¨UI
+         document.getElementById('difficultyFilter').value = '';
+         document.getElementById('categoryFilter').value = '';
+         document.getElementById('sortFilter').value = 'relevance';
+ 
+         // æ˜¾ç¤ºåŸå§‹ç»“æœ
+         this.displayResults(this.currentResults);
+         this.updateSearchStats(`æ‰¾åˆ° ${this.currentResults.length} ä¸ªç›¸å…³å­¦ä¹ æ¨¡å—`);
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ’åºç»“æœ
+      * @param {Array} results - ç»“æœæ•°ç»„
+      * @param {string} sortBy - æ’åºæ–¹å¼
+      * @returns {Array} æ’åºåçš„ç»“æœ
+      */
+     sortResults(results, sortBy) {
+         switch (sortBy) {
+             case 'rating':
+                 return results.sort((a, b) => b.rating - a.rating);
+             case 'difficulty':
+                 const difficultyOrder = { 'beginner': 1, 'intermediate': 2, 'advanced': 3 };
+                 return results.sort((a, b) => difficultyOrder[a.difficulty] - difficultyOrder[b.difficulty]);
+             case 'time':
+                 return results.sort((a, b) => {
+                     const timeA = parseInt(a.estimatedTime) || 0;
+                     const timeB = parseInt(b.estimatedTime) || 0;
+                     return timeA - timeB;
+                 });
+             case 'relevance':
+             default:
+                 return results.sort((a, b) => (b.relevanceScore || 0) - (a.relevanceScore || 0));
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ–°æœç´¢
+      * @param {string} keyword - æ–°çš„æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯
+      */
+     newSearch(keyword) {
+         const searchUrl = `search-results.html?q=${encodeURIComponent(keyword)}`;
+         window.location.href = searchUrl;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤º/éšè—åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
+      * @param {boolean} show - æ˜¯å¦æ˜¾ç¤º
+      */
+     showLoading(show) {
+         const loadingContainer = document.getElementById('loadingContainer');
+         const resultsContainer = document.getElementById('resultsContainer');
+         
+         if (loadingContainer) {
+             loadingContainer.style.display = show ? 'block' : 'none';
+         }
+         
+         if (!show && resultsContainer) {
+             resultsContainer.style.display = 'block';
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ˜¾ç¤ºé”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
+      * @param {string} message - é”™è¯¯æ¶ˆæ¯
+      */
+     showError(message) {
+         const emptyResults = document.getElementById('emptyResults');
+         if (emptyResults) {
+             emptyResults.style.display = 'block';
+             emptyResults.innerHTML = `
+                 <i class="bi bi-exclamation-triangle display-1 text-warning"></i>
+                 <h3 class="mt-3">å‡ºç°é”™è¯¯</h3>
+                 <p class="text-muted">${message}</p>
+                 <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="window.location.href='../index.html'">
+                     <i class="bi bi-house-door"></i> è¿”å›é¦–é¡µ
+                 </button>
+             `;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°æœç´¢ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
+      * @param {string} text - ç»Ÿè®¡æ–‡æœ¬
+      */
+     updateSearchStats(text) {
+         const searchStats = document.getElementById('searchStats');
+         if (searchStats) {
+             searchStats.textContent = text;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     // è¾…åŠ©æ–¹æ³•
+     getDifficultyText(difficulty) {
+         const map = {
+             'beginner': 'åˆçº§',
+             'intermediate': 'ä¸­çº§',
+             'advanced': 'é«˜çº§'
+         };
+         return map[difficulty] || difficulty;
+     }
+ 
+     getCategoryText(category) {
+         const map = {
+             'technology': 'æŠ€æœ¯',
+             'science': 'ç§‘å­¦',
+             'law': 'æ³•å¾‹',
+             'history': 'å†å²',
+             'literature': 'æ–‡å­¦',
+             'general': 'é€šç”¨'
+         };
+         return map[category] || category;
+     }
+ 
+     getModuleIcon(category) {
+         const icons = {
+             'technology': 'ğŸ’»',
+             'science': 'ğŸ”¬',
+             'law': 'âš–ï¸',
+             'history': 'ğŸ“š',
+             'literature': 'ğŸ“–',
+             'general': 'ğŸ“'
+         };
+         return icons[category] || 'ğŸ“˜';
+     }
+ 
+     generateStarsHTML(rating) {
+         const fullStars = Math.floor(rating);
+         const hasHalfStar = rating % 1 >= 0.5;
+         let html = '';
+         
+         for (let i = 0; i < fullStars; i++) {
+             html += '<i class="bi bi-star-fill"></i>';
+         }
+         
+         if (hasHalfStar) {
+             html += '<i class="bi bi-star-half"></i>';
+         }
+         
+         const emptyStars = 5 - fullStars - (hasHalfStar ? 1 : 0);
+         for (let i = 0; i < emptyStars; i++) {
+             html += '<i class="bi bi-star"></i>';
+         }
+         
+         return html;
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆååˆå§‹åŒ–åº”ç”¨
+ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
+     new SearchResultsApp();
+ }); 
```

```diff
+ #!/usr/bin/env python3
+ # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
+ 
+ import http.server
+ import socketserver
+ import os
+ import sys
+ from urllib.parse import urlparse
+ 
+ class CORSRequestHandler(http.server.SimpleHTTPRequestHandler):
+     def end_headers(self):
+         self.send_header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', '*')
+         self.send_header('Access-Control-Allow-Methods', 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS')
+         self.send_header('Access-Control-Allow-Headers', 'Content-Type, Authorization')
+         super().end_headers()
+ 
+     def do_OPTIONS(self):
+         self.send_response(200)
+         self.end_headers()
+ 
+     def log_message(self, format, *args):
+         print(f"[{self.address_string()}] {format % args}")
+ 
+ def start_server(port=3000):
+     # åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°frontendç›®å½•
+     frontend_dir = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
+     os.chdir(frontend_dir)
+     
+     try:
+         with socketserver.TCPServer(("", port), CORSRequestHandler) as httpd:
+             print(f"ğŸš€ å‰ç«¯æœåŠ¡å™¨å¯åŠ¨æˆåŠŸ!")
+             print(f"ğŸ“ åœ°å€: http://localhost:{port}")
+             print(f"ğŸ“ ç›®å½•: {frontend_dir}")
+             print(f"ğŸŒ è¯·åœ¨æµè§ˆå™¨ä¸­æ‰“å¼€: http://localhost:{port}")
+             print(f"â¹ï¸  æŒ‰ Ctrl+C åœæ­¢æœåŠ¡å™¨")
+             print("-" * 50)
+             
+             httpd.serve_forever()
+     except KeyboardInterrupt:
+         print("\nğŸ›‘ æœåŠ¡å™¨å·²åœæ­¢")
+     except OSError as e:
+         if e.errno == 48:  # Address already in use
+             print(f"âŒ ç«¯å£ {port} å·²è¢«å ç”¨ï¼Œå°è¯•ä½¿ç”¨ç«¯å£ {port + 1}")
+             start_server(port + 1)
+         else:
+             print(f"âŒ å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡å™¨å¤±è´¥: {e}")
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     port = 3000
+     if len(sys.argv) > 1:
+         try:
+             port = int(sys.argv[1])
+         except ValueError:
+             print("ç«¯å£å·å¿…é¡»æ˜¯æ•°å­—")
+             sys.exit(1)
+
```

```diff
+                     statusEl.className = 'alert alert-danger';
+                     statusEl.innerHTML = `âŒ åç«¯è¿æ¥å¤±è´¥: ${error.message}<br>
+                                         ğŸ“ è¯·ç¡®ä¿åç«¯æœåŠ¡å™¨åœ¨8080ç«¯å£è¿è¡Œ<br>
+                                         ğŸ”§ å¯ä»¥å…ˆæµ‹è¯•å‰ç«¯åŠŸèƒ½çš„æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®`;
+                     
+                     // æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®æŒ‰é’®
+                     statusEl.innerHTML += `<br><button class="btn btn-warning mt-2" onclick="searchTester.showMockData()">ğŸ­ æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ•°æ®</button>`;
+                 }
+             }
+ 
+             async testSearch(keyword) {
+                 if (!keyword.trim()) {
+                     alert('è¯·è¾“å…¥æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯');
+                     return;
+                 }
+ 
+                 const resultsEl = document.getElementById('searchResults');
+                 resultsEl.innerHTML = `
+                     <div class="loading-spinner">
+                         <div class="spinner-border text-primary" role="status">
+                             <span class="visually-hidden">Loading...</span>
+                         </div>
+                         <p class="mt-2">æ­£åœ¨æœç´¢"${keyword}"...</p>
+                     </div>
+                 `;
+ 
+                 try {
+                     const response = await fetch(
+                         `${this.apiBaseUrl}/search/modules?keyword=${encodeURIComponent(keyword)}&page=0&size=6`,
+                         {
+                             method: 'GET',
+                             headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json' }
+                         }
+                     );
+ 
+                     if (!response.ok) {
+                         throw new Error(`HTTP ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`);
+                     }
+ 
+                     const result = await response.json();
+                     
+                     if (result.success && result.data) {
+                         this.displayResults(result.data, keyword);
+                     } else {
+                         throw new Error(result.message || 'æœç´¢å¤±è´¥');
+                     }
+ 
+                 } catch (error) {
+                     resultsEl.innerHTML = `
+                         <div class="alert alert-danger">
+                             <h5>âŒ æœç´¢å¤±è´¥</h5>
+                             <p><strong>é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯:</strong> ${error.message}</p>
+                             <p><strong>å¯èƒ½åŸå› :</strong></p>
+                             <ul>
+                                 <li>åç«¯æœåŠ¡å™¨æœªå¯åŠ¨ï¼ˆæ£€æŸ¥8080ç«¯å£ï¼‰</li>
+                                 <li>CORSè·¨åŸŸé—®é¢˜</li>
+                                 <li>ç½‘ç»œè¿æ¥é—®é¢˜</li>
+                             </ul>
+                             <button class="btn btn-warning" onclick="searchTester.showMockData('${keyword}')">ğŸ­ æŸ¥çœ‹æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç»“æœ</button>
+                         </div>
+                     `;
+                 }
+             }
+ 
+             displayResults(modules, keyword) {
+                 const resultsEl = document.getElementById('searchResults');
+                 
+                 if (!modules.length) {
+                     resultsEl.innerHTML = `
+                         <div class="alert alert-warning">
+                             <h5>ğŸ“ æ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°ç›¸å…³è¯¾ç¨‹</h5>
+                             <p>å…³é”®è¯"${keyword}"æ²¡æœ‰åŒ¹é…çš„å­¦ä¹ æ¨¡å—</p>
+                         </div>
+                     `;
+                     return;
+                 }
+ 
+                 const cardsHTML = modules.map(module => `
+                     <div class="col-md-6 col-lg-4 mb-3">
+                         <div class="card h-100">
+                             <div class="card-header bg-primary text-white">
+                                 <h6 class="mb-0">ğŸ“š ${module.title}</h6>
+                             </div>
+                             <div class="card-body">
+                                 <p class="card-text">${module.description}</p>
+                                 <div class="mb-2">
+                                     ${module.tags.map(tag => `<span class="badge bg-secondary me-1">${tag}</span>`).join('')}
+                                 </div>
+                                 <small class="text-muted">
+                                     â±ï¸ ${module.estimatedTime} | 
+                                     â­ ${module.rating} (${module.reviewCount}æ¡è¯„ä»·)
+                                 </small>
+                             </div>
+                             <div class="card-footer">
+                                 <button class="btn btn-primary btn-sm w-100">â–¶ï¸ å¼€å§‹å­¦ä¹ </button>
+                             </div>
+                         </div>
+                     </div>
+                 `).join('');
+ 
+                 resultsEl.innerHTML = `
+                     <div class="alert alert-success">
+                         <h5>âœ… æœç´¢æˆåŠŸï¼</h5>
+                         <p>æ‰¾åˆ° <strong>${modules.length}</strong> ä¸ªå…³äº"${keyword}"çš„è¯¾ç¨‹</p>
+                     </div>
+                     <div class="row">
+                         ${cardsHTML}
+                     </div>
+                 `;
+             }
+ 
+             showMockData(keyword = 'å¦‚ä½•åˆ›ä½œä¸€é¦–éŸ³ä¹') {
```

## ğŸ”§ æŠ€æœ¯å®ç°è¦ç‚¹

### çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†
```javascript
class AICoursePlatform {
  constructor() {
    this.currentTopic = null;
    this.currentModule = null; 
    this.currentChapter = null;
    this.currentLecture = null;
    this.courseStructure = null; // ç¼“å­˜AIè¿”å›çš„ç»“æ„
    this.lectureCache = new Map(); // ç¼“å­˜å·²åŠ è½½çš„å†…å®¹
  }
  
  async loadTopicBreakdown(topic) {
    // è°ƒç”¨AI APIè·å–ä¸»é¢˜åˆ†è§£
    const response = await apiService.getTopicBreakdown(topic);
    this.currentTopic = topic;
    return response;
  }
  
  async loadModuleStructure(topic, module) {
    // è°ƒç”¨AI APIè·å–æ¨¡å—ç»“æ„  
    const response = await apiService.getModuleStructure(topic, module);
    this.courseStructure = response;
    return response;
  }
  
  async loadLectureContent(topic, module, chapter, lecture) {
    // æ£€æŸ¥ç¼“å­˜
    const cacheKey = `${topic}-${module}-${chapter}-${lecture}`;
    if (this.lectureCache.has(cacheKey)) {
      return this.lectureCache.get(cacheKey);
    }
    
    // è°ƒç”¨AI APIè·å–å…·ä½“å†…å®¹
    const response = await apiService.getLectureContent(topic, module, chapter, lecture);
    this.lectureCache.set(cacheKey, response);
    return response;
  }
}
```

## ğŸ’¾ æœ¬åœ°å­˜å‚¨ç­–ç•¥è®¾è®¡

### ç¼“å­˜ç»“æ„è®¾è®¡
```javascript
class CourseCache {
  constructor() {
    this.CACHE_PREFIX = 'whys_course_';
    this.CACHE_VERSION = '1.0';
  }
  
  // ä¸»é¢˜åˆ†è§£ç¼“å­˜
  cacheTopicBreakdown(topic, data) {
    const key = `${this.CACHE_PREFIX}topic_${topic}`;
    const cacheData = {
      version: this.CACHE_VERSION,
      timestamp: Date.now(),
      data: data
    };
    localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(cacheData));
  }
  
  // è¯¾ç¨‹ç»“æ„ç¼“å­˜
  cacheCourseStructure(topic, module, data) {
    const key = `${this.CACHE_PREFIX}structure_${topic}_${module}`;
    const cacheData = {
      version: this.CACHE_VERSION,
      timestamp: Date.now(),
      data: data
    };
    localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(cacheData));
  }
  
  // è®²æ¬¡å†…å®¹ç¼“å­˜
  cacheLectureContent(topic, module, chapter, lecture, data) {
    const key = `${this.CACHE_PREFIX}content_${topic}_${module}_${chapter}_${lecture}`;
    const cacheData = {
      version: this.CACHE_VERSION,
      timestamp: Date.now(),
      data: data
    };
    localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(cacheData));
  }
  
  // æ£€æŸ¥ç¼“å­˜æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•ˆï¼ˆ24å°æ—¶æœ‰æ•ˆæœŸï¼‰
  isCacheValid(cacheData) {
    if (!cacheData) return false;
    const now = Date.now();
    const cacheAge = now - cacheData.timestamp;
    const maxAge = 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000; // 24å°æ—¶
    return cacheAge < maxAge && cacheData.version === this.CACHE_VERSION;
  }
}
```
